result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jacob M Arendt

defendant.name: Arendt, Jacob M
defendant.address: 8821 South Wood Creek Drive #10, Oak Creek, WI 53154

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Jacob M Arendt in court.  Attorney Daniel Morgan Adams appeared by phone for Jacob M Arendt. 
OFF THE RECORD  This matter is adjourned to 11/10/22 at 8:30 for scheduling.  mn

PROPOSED ORDER AUTHORIZING DEFENSE HIRING OF PRIVATE
INVESTIGATOR; Signed and Filed.
Defense's Motion to Allow Defense to Hire Private Investigator; received, filed and forwarded to the Judge for review.
Order Appointing Attorney at County Expense; signed and filed.

Defendant Jacob M Arendt in court. Attorney Munjed Ahmad in court for Jacob M Arend. Attorney Erin Karshen appeared in court on behalf of Attorney Samuel Tufford for State of Wisconsin. 

Case in Court for Motion to Withdraw hearing. Discussion placed on the record. Court  recently appointed Attorney Munjed Ahmad, however due to conflict he must withdraw as counsel. Court appoints Attorney Daniel Morgan Adams who shall be paid at the rate of $100.00 per hour. Court orders defendant to repay the County at a rate of $50.00/month beginning upon completion of the case and every month thereafter until paid in full. Court addressed good JusticePoint Report. Case adjourned for Scheduling conference in Branch 45.
Scheduling conference scheduled for November 10, 2022 at 08:30 am.
records.descr: Motion and order for withdrawal of counsel

records.addlTxt: Attorney Ahmad phoned the court to advise that due to conflict he must withdraw as counsel.  Case is adjourned in Br 45.  mn

Defendant Jacob M Arendt in court.  Prosecuting attorney Samuel Tufford in court for the State of Wisconsin.   Defendant appears in Court without counsel.  Defendant is not eligible for public defender representation. Defendant requests court appointed counsel at the county rate. Court appoints Attorney Munjed Ahmad who shall be paid at the rate of $100.00 per hour. Court orders defendant to repay the County at a rate of $50.00/month beginning upon completion of the case and every month thereafter until paid in full.  Case adjourned for pretrial conference in Branch 45.  mn
Pre-trial conference scheduled for November 1, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
Oral No Contact Order with KKD. Court advised Defendant that failure to comply with conditions of bail may result in an additional charge of bail jumping.

Defendant Jacob M Arendt appeared by video, in custody.  Attorney William Scott Nelson appeared by video for Jacob M Arendt.  Prosecuting attorney Foley J. Van Lieshout Ms. appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Defendant is advised that due to the intake calendar of the week, this case has been re-assigned to Judge Jean Kies, Branch 45.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause.  Defendant advised of right to counsel and complaint given to defendant's attorney.  Defendant plead not guilty.DEFENDANT DOES NOT QUALIFY FOR PUBLIC DEFENDER REPRESENTATION IF RELEASED FROM CUSTODY.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for September 23, 2022 at 08:30 am.
Arrest Warrant received from the D.A.'s office on filing date of Criminal Complaint.
